channel.title: Yup another spammer xD

item.title: Yup another spammer xD
item.dc:creator: @Decelo Decelo
item.description:
@Decelo wrote:

yeah well guess your think not another spammer but hey I did it for coding purposes to help me learn and I did and mabye somebody else might learn from the script, so here it is!

Features:

Human like typing: using a procedure that types just like a human.

Wait between spams: Will wait certain time between spams in seconds, it is radomized so dont worry about that. put 0 there to make it spam the text forever

Times to spam: Choose how many times you want to spam your text.

Safe mode: On or off, off wil probs get you banned. off has no human like typing or any wait times between spams.

Type Speed: fast, slow or normal, normal recommended for runescape, and slow is really slow

If you have any suggestions or get any errors just post here or pm me

Ok heres my second script enjoy.

[scar]{ Decelo’s Spammer }
{ Version 1.1 }
{ Steup Lines 16-20 }

program Spammer;
var
TypeText, TypeSpeed: string;
WaitTime, Times: integer;
NoText, SafeMode: boolean;

procedure DeclareText;
begin
{========================================================================}
{============================ Setup Here ================================}
{========================================================================}
TypeText:=(‘Text Here’) //Text to spam.
Times:= 1 //how may times to spam it, put 0 there to make it go for ever.
WaitTime:= 1 //How long to wait(in seconds)between each spam(it Is radomized)
SafeMode:= True //If false you will probebly get banned.
TypeSpeed:=(‘Normal’)//Choose Normal, Fast or Slow.
//Fast might get you banned? not sure =
{========================================================================}
{======================= Do Not Edit Below Here =========================}
{========================================================================}
end;

procedure SendKeysH(Text: string);
var
I: Integer;
begin
I := 1;
if (typespeed = ‘normal’) then
begin
repeat
wait(random(250) + 25);
sendkeys(copy(Text, I, 1));
I := I + 1;
until (I > length(Text));
end;

if (typespeed = ‘slow’) then
begin
repeat
wait(random(500) + 750);
sendkeys(copy(Text, I, 1));
I := I + 1;
until (I > length(Text));
end;

if (typespeed = ‘fast’) then
begin
repeat
wait(random(50) + 5);
sendkeys(copy(Text, I, 1));
I := I + 1;
until (I > length(Text));
end
else
begin
repeat
wait(random(250) + 25);
sendkeys(copy(Text, I, 1));
I := I + 1;
until (I > length(Text));
end;
wait(random(150) + 50)
SendKeysVb(’{ENTER}’, false)
end;

procedure WhatIf;
begin
if typetext = (’’) then
NoText := True
end;

procedure TypeTextNow;
var Spammed: integer;
begin
waittime := waittime * 1000
if (safemode = true) then
begin
repeat
wait(random(1000) + waittime)
SendKeysH(typetext)
spammed := spammed + 1
until (spammed = times)
end
else
begin
repeat
wait(10)
SendKeys(typetext)
SendKeysVb(’{ENTER}’, false)
spammed := spammed + 1
until (spammed = times)
end;
end;

begin
cleardebug;
DeclareText;
WhatIf;
if (NoText = False) then
begin
TypeTextNow;
Writeln(‘Successfully Spammed "’ + typetext + ‘" ’ + inttostr(times) +’ Time(s).’);
end
else
Writeln(‘There is nothing to spam silly!’);
end.[/scar]
